articles.author: Timothy Jones
articles.title: EU agrees on complete ban of Russian gas imports by 2027 - DW.com
articles.description: The European Union has taken another step toward ending its energy reliance on Russia by agreeing to stop gas imports from the country.  But not all countries voted in favor of the ban.
articles.content: Ministers from the 27 EU member states on Monday gave their final approval to a regulation that will see all Russian gas imports into the bloc banned by late 2027, a vote that allows the measure to p… [+1695 chars]
